message: Let's make a deal Bob, 60 for me and 40 for you. A fair offer to kick things off, don't you think?
Okay Alice, how about a 55/45 split in my favor?  It's still a good deal for you before inflation eats away at your share.
Bob, my turn. I understand the inflation pressure, so let's settle this fairly. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. It's better than what you offered last round, considering time is against me.
